title: Stand Up, Falling Down
description: In the Summer of 2014 Jimmy Perrin, author of books such as, "Hard Up 1, 2 and 3" was asked to write his biography, HE REFUSED !! Instead he wrote a part bi, part stand-up comedian book. NOW HE'S BACK !! More funnier... "Did you really just call me bi-sexual in the last part? More sexier... "No I ain't getting my bum out for another cover picture" More outrageous... "I will do a full frontal inside, instead" Much More controversial than the first book, Much more of Jimmy, just being Jimmy.
author: Jimmy Perrin
